product_name: Hommade Coconut Milk, 200ml: Amazon.in: Amazon Pantry

reviews.review_title: Great milk and quite useful in many things
reviews.review_body: Have been using this milk for quite some time now and its quite useful.Great to consume--------------------Coconut milk is a good replacement for milk especially for those who are lactose intolerant. On top this provides HDL and Lauric acid which is important for healthy heart and brain. Just consume a bit daily and you will feel the difference over time.To be used in cooking-------------------------It can be used in cooking for variety of preparations. Be it in soups or curries or even in smoothies. Smoothies taste so good with coconut milk.For skin and hair-------------------It's a great conditioner and moisturizer. Mix it with oils and apply on hair and scalp and even skin for natural moisturizing.I wish they had a bigger pack as well as we use it regularly.Would highly recommend this.
I have been using this as a hair conditioner along with aloe Vera gel. This is amazing.

Always favour this apart from keya which was imported. Coconut milk is authentic and thick and makes for an excellent addition to stews,avial etc. Find it easy and convenient to use. Can also make good green Thai curries.

reviews.review_title: An excellent product - I use for my tea and cant ...
reviews.review_body: An excellent product - I use for my tea and cant tell the difference between milk. Otherwise, it tastes great !!
A pretty ordinary product.It is the thin extract of Coconut milk
I didn't find the flavour to be very great, but that's a personal choice. The content is thick and creamy.
The package was ruptured and the contents had spilled out. Hence REJECTED the package.
